verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.

verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.niv: 6 Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you."
verses.kjv: 6 Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
verses.esv: 6 Be strong and courageous. Do not fear or be in dread of them, for it is the LORD your God who goes with you. He will not leave you or forsake you.”

verses.niv: 31 but those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
verses.kjv: 31 But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
verses.esv:
31   but they who wait for the LORD shall renew their strength;
    they shall mount up with wings like eagles;
  they shall run and not be weary;
    they shall walk and not faint.

verses.niv: 2 The LORD is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation. He is my God, and I will praise him, my father's God, and I will exalt him.
verses.kjv: 2 The LORD is my strength and song, and he is become my salvation: he is my God, and I will prepare him an habitation; my father’s God, and I will exalt him.
verses.esv:
2   The LORD is my strength and my song,
    and he has become my salvation;
  this is my God, and I will praise him,
    my father’s God, and I will exalt him.

verses.niv: 10 Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.
verses.kjv: 10 Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
verses.esv: 10 Finally, be strong in the Lord and in the strength of his might.

verses.niv: 13 No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.
verses.kjv: 13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
verses.esv: 13 No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tempted beyond your ability, but with the temptation he will also provide the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.

verses.niv: 11 Look to the LORD and his strength; seek his face always.
verses.kjv: 11 Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.
verses.esv:
11   Seek the LORD and his strength;
    seek his presence continually!

verses.niv: 7 For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.
verses.kjv: 7 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
verses.esv: 7 for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.

verses.niv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be terrified; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go."
verses.kjv: 9 Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.esv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.”

verses.niv: 9 But he said to me, "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me. 10 That is why, for Christ's sake, I delight in weaknesses, in insults, in hardships, in persecutions, in difficulties. For when I am weak, then I am strong.
verses.kjv: 9 And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. 10 Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ’s sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.
verses.esv: 9 But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me. 10 For the sake of Christ, then, I am content with weaknesses, insults, hardships, persecutions, and calamities. For when I am weak, then I am strong.

verses.niv: 13 Be on your guard; stand firm in the faith; be men of courage; be strong.
verses.kjv: 13 Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
verses.esv: 13 Be watchful, stand firm in the faith, act like men, be strong.

verses.niv: 4 For the LORD your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory."
verses.kjv: 4 For the LORD your God is he that goeth with you, to fight for you against your enemies, to save you.
verses.esv: 4 for the LORD your God is he who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies, to give you the victory.’

verses.niv: 29 He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
verses.kjv: 29 He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
verses.esv:
29   He gives power to the faint,
    and to him who has no might he increases strength.

verses.niv: 2 Surely God is my salvation; I will trust and not be afraid. The LORD, the LORD, is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation."
verses.kjv: 2 Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
verses.esv:
2   “Behold, God is my salvation;
    I will trust, and will not be afraid;
  for the LORD GOD is my strength and my song,
    and he has become my salvation.”

verses.niv: 26 My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.
verses.kjv: 26 My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
verses.esv:
26   My flesh and my heart may fail,
    but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.

verses.niv: 1 The LORD is my light and my salvation- whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life- of whom shall I be afraid?
verses.kjv: 1 The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
verses.esv:
Of David.

27:1   The LORD is my light and my salvation;
    whom shall I fear?
  The LORD is the stronghold of my life;
    of whom shall I be afraid?

verses.niv: 19 The Sovereign LORD is my strength; he makes my feet like the feet of a deer, he enables me to go on the heights. For the director of music. On my stringed instruments.
verses.kjv: 19 The LORD God is my strength, and he will make my feet like hinds’ feet, and he will make me to walk upon mine high places. To the chief singer on my stringed instruments.
verses.esv:
19   GOD, the Lord, is my strength;
    he makes my feet like the deer’s;
    he makes me tread on my high places.
  To the choirmaster: with stringed instruments.

verses.niv: 24 Be strong and take heart, all you who hope in the LORD.
verses.kjv: 24 Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the LORD.
verses.esv:
24   Be strong, and let your heart take courage,
    all you who wait for the LORD!

verses.niv: 30 Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength.'
verses.kjv: 30 And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.
verses.esv: 30 And you shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength.’

verses.niv: 1 God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
verses.kjv: 1 God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
verses.esv:
To the choirmaster. Of the Sons of Korah. According to Alamoth. A Song.

46:1   God is our refuge and strength,
    a very present help in trouble.

verses.niv: 28 "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
verses.kjv: 28 Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
verses.esv: 28 Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

verses.niv: 10 Nehemiah said, "Go and enjoy choice food and sweet drinks, and send some to those who have nothing prepared. This day is sacred to our Lord. Do not grieve, for the joy of the LORD is your strength."
verses.kjv: 10 Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the LORD is your strength.
verses.esv: 10 Then he said to them, “Go your way. Eat the fat and drink sweet wine and send portions to anyone who has nothing ready, for this day is holy to our Lord. And do not be grieved, for the joy of the LORD is your strength.”

verses.niv: 9 But he said to me, "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me.
verses.kjv: 9 And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
verses.esv: 9 But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”
